attributes.action: Active Political support for Christians in Iraq
attributes.additional_details: The Christians in Iraq feel forgotten by the world. They are being massacred by ISIS, or having to flee for their lives.  They have nothing!  I wish for the Foreign and Commonwealth Office to support those working for peace in Iraq, such as Cannon Andrew White, Vicar of St Georges in Baghdad, and to actively work with the government of Iraq to bring about a solution to the current crisis in Iraq.
